front.title: iFCP - A Protocol for Internet Fibre Channel Storage Networking

abstract.t: This document specifies iFCP, a gateway-to-gateway protocol for theimplementation of a Fibre Channel fabric in which TCP/IP switchingand routing elements replace Fibre Channel components. Theprotocol enables the attachment of existing Fibre Channel storageproducts to an IP network by supporting the subset of fabricservices required by such devices
